testimonials.text: Mr. abdullah is a good colleague and a good person to deal and work with, he is quite serious and committed to his job and knows exactly his role and respect others' it is a pleasure to work with Mr.abdallah as he has a positive effect to others.

It was pleasure to work with Abdullah Atrash for over four years ago, I was impressed with his work ethic, friendly personality, and ability to work well under pressure. He is a creative energetic person who has new ideas for constantly developing work and able to solve any problem that might face him at work and even if it took much of his time, he was the management of the Internet unit in the television and he was a brilliant leader of the team. It was a period of development in our section.he was always willing to offer his assistance and had an excellent rapport with the clients, employers, and other professional organization. He is a great asset to any company that he is with.
